name: Mark Meloon
tagline: Mathematician and Data Scientist For Hire
body:
### Welcome to My Repository!
This repository contains projects focused on data science, whether it is Hadoop project for analyzing Big Data or small R scripts or IPython notebooks for interactive exploration. Data science covers a lot of ground and I have expertise in a number of areas. Most of the work here, however, will fall into the following categories:
* Data cleansing
* Machine learning
* Social network analysis
* Social media data
* Big data

Programs will usually be in Python or Java. Database technologies will usually be Hadoop and MapReduce.

### Available for Hire!
I am currently seeking a full time position in data science. Some things you should know about me:
* Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics from California Institute of Technology
* 10+ years experience solving complex analytical problems using uncleansed data
* Expertise in machine learning, statistical modelling, data fusion, and signal processing
* 10+ years experience developing software in C/C++, Python, MatLab, and Java

To find out if I might be a useful addition to your company, please find out more about me at [my LinkedIn profile](http://MeloonLinkedIn.com)
